sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-row class="info" :gutter="20">
        <el-col :span="20" style="margin-top:20px">
            <el-card>
                <el-form ref="form" :model="form" label-width="80px">
                    <el-form-item label="帖子名称">
                        <el-input v-model="form.name"></el-input>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="所属板块">
                        <el-select v-model="form.region" placeholder="请选择活动区域">
                            <el-option label="计算机系" value="computer"></el-option>
                            <el-option label="数学系" value="math"></el-option>
                        </el-select>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="开启匿名">
                        <el-switch v-model="form.delivery"></el-switch>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="帖子标签">
                        <el-checkbox-group v-model="form.type">
                            <el-checkbox label="匿名" name="type"></el-checkbox>
                        </el-checkbox-group>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="活动形式">
                        <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.desc"></el-input>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item>
                        <el-button type="primary" @click="onSubmit">发表</el-button>
                    </el-form-item>
                </el-form>
            </el-card>
        </el-col>
    </el-row>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "viewHomePage",
        data() {
            return {

            }
        }
    }
</script>
